Success and Achievement.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
Success and Achievement.author: Napoleon Hill

Success and Achievement.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
Success and Achievement.author: Albert Einstein

Success and Achievement.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
Success and Achievement.author: Babe Ruth

Success and Achievement.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
Success and Achievement.author: W. Clement Stone

Success and Achievement.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
Success and Achievement.author: Frank Sinatra

Success and Achievement.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
Success and Achievement.author: Bill Cosby

Success and Achievement.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
Success and Achievement.author: Albert Einstein

Success and Achievement.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
Success and Achievement.author: Norman Vaughan

Success and Achievement.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Success and Achievement.author: George Eliot

Overcoming Challenges and Failure.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
Overcoming Challenges and Failure.author: Wayne Gretzky

Overcoming Challenges and Failure.quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
Overcoming Challenges and Failure.author: Michael Jordan

Overcoming Challenges and Failure.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
Overcoming Challenges and Failure.author: Amelia Earhart

Overcoming Challenges and Failure.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Overcoming Challenges and Failure.author: Christopher Columbus

Overcoming Challenges and Failure.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
Overcoming Challenges and Failure.author: Japanese Proverb

Overcoming Challenges and Failure.quote: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
Overcoming Challenges and Failure.author: Chinese Proverb

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Kevin Kruse

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: We become what we think about.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Earl Nightingale

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Mark Twain

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Charles Swindoll

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Alice Walker

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Buddha

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Chinese Proverb

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Socrates

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Grandma Moses

Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Self-Improvement and Personal Growth.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Wisdom and Reflection.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
Wisdom and Reflection.author: Mark Twain

Wisdom and Reflection.quote: Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.
Wisdom and Reflection.author: Sir Claus Moser

Wisdom and Reflection.quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
Wisdom and Reflection.author: Dalai Lama

Wisdom and Reflection.quote: It’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
Wisdom and Reflection.author: Abraham Lincoln

Wisdom and Reflection.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
Wisdom and Reflection.author: Maya Angelou

Inspiration and Motivation.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
Inspiration and Motivation.author: Chinese Proverb

Inspiration and Motivation.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
Inspiration and Motivation.author: Alice Walker

Inspiration and Motivation.quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
Inspiration and Motivation.author: Maya Angelou

Inspiration and Motivation.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Inspiration and Motivation.author: George Addair

Inspiration and Motivation.quote: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing, no one to blame.
Inspiration and Motivation.author: Erica Jong

Inspiration and Motivation.quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
Inspiration and Motivation.author: Maya Angelou

Inspiration and Motivation.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
Inspiration and Motivation.author: Norman Vaughan

Action and Determination.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Action and Determination.author: Arthur Ashe

Action and Determination.quote: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
Action and Determination.author: Latin Proverb

Action and Determination.quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
Action and Determination.author: Tony Robbins

Action and Determination.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
Action and Determination.author: Henry Ford

Creativity and Innovation.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
Creativity and Innovation.author: Pablo Picasso

Creativity and Innovation.quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
Creativity and Innovation.author: Benjamin Franklin

Leadership and Influence.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
Leadership and Influence.author: Jesus

Leadership and Influence.quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
Leadership and Influence.author: Booker T. Washington

Leadership and Influence.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
Leadership and Influence.author: Farrah Gray

Leadership and Influence.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
Leadership and Influence.author: Ayn Rand

Happiness and Fulfillment.quote: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me.
Happiness and Fulfillment.author: Erma Bombeck

Happiness and Fulfillment.quote: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
Happiness and Fulfillment.author: Dalai Lama

Happiness and Fulfillment.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
Happiness and Fulfillment.author: Vincent van Gogh

Happiness and Fulfillment.quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
Happiness and Fulfillment.author: Unknown

Happiness and Fulfillment.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
Happiness and Fulfillment.author: Oprah Winfrey
